title: Embroidered Picture, 1836
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique:
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 53 x 85 cm (20 7/8 x 33 7/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Horizontal panel showing Bridge, five boats on river, several buildings on the shore; eagle in the sky with wreath "A View of Conway Bridge 1836"; on the lower border are two harps, two sheep and "Elizabeth Parry St. Asaph."

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1836.
1836. Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique:. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-84.
